Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: it looked like a sattlelight at first, but it was moving and it was somehow connected to another star.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was cooking a steak and i was sitting in the patio chair, i was watching two stars, one star was brighter than the other one right? i was watching the brighter star. it was making some iratic moves. like up down sideways very fast, around the dimmer star. i thought it was a commet, then a sattlite. maybe a plane? I actually saw a plane fly under it. i dont think it was that . it freaked me out. because i was watching it for 5 mins. no repeated moves, then all of the sudden it took form, it connected the bright star to the dim star, and it was moving east!it was not triangle shape. i thought it was a stealth blimp but that changed my mind on it. i tried to show my friend 1 friend saw one star moving. i watched it again, the bright star was circling around the dimmer star real fast and it disapeared into the dimmer star! i saw another star on the right that was also kinda dim, it wint into the dim star!! i was freakinng out.. i dont know what that is. i know for sure that wasnt the space station!
